Key Match Events: De'Aaron Fox recorded 33 points, 6 rebounds, and 6 assists
Domantas Sabonis had 17 points and 16 rebounds
Pre-Game Insights: Facing an injury-riddled Dallas Mavericks who were missing Luka Dončić, Kyrie Irving, and Klay Thompson
Post-Match Reflections: The Kings have a long way to go to climb back into the Western Conference playoff picture, but tonight was a step in the right direction
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sacramento held Dallas to just 40 points in the second half and used their defense to lead to offense, finishing the game with 25 points off 17 Mavericks turnovers
